Description: Prosecution being taken by the CPS, breach of HSWA Section 2 (1), breach of HSWA Section 3(1), against Toppesfield Limited. A second prosecution is being taken against the individual Cosmin Stanciu for death by careless driving, both cases will be linked and heard together.
Offence Date: This case did result from the investigation of a fatality
